body:
HI guys,  Me again, I swear I'm not trying to piss you off.  So this time after updates I'm getting a runtime error in the 'Honeybee_Run Energy Simulation Component'.  Error:  Runtime error (TypeErrorException): unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'str' and 'NoneType'
Traceback:
line 1206, in writeBatchFile, "<string>"
line 2022, in main, "<string>"
line 2040, in script I've trying rebuilding the definition from scratch several times, messed around with permissions but nothing makes a difference. I suppose something change in recent updates because it was working fine in version 0.0.56.  regards,  Mauricio  P.S. You guys have better support than any Autodesk product.

replies.body:
This is the same as this one:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honeybee-en...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honeybee-energy-sim-runtime-error-1)



I'm closing it!
